Articles.Content:
I've made a custom KerbNetMode using CustomButtonCallback. When I click on this button, I want to refresh the KerbNet display. Can't figure out how to do that. What's the best way to make that work?

https://kerbalspaceprogram.com/api/class_kerb_net_1_1_kerb_net_mode.html

Also:

https://kerbalspaceprogram.com/api/class_module_kerb_net_access.html
